summary: This bill, the Preventing Illegal Weapons Trafficking Act of 2025, addresses the importation and proliferation of machinegun conversion devices. It mandates a strategy by the Attorney General, Secretary of Homeland Security, and Secretary of the Treasury to prevent and intercept the trafficking of these devices. This strategy involves collaboration between federal and local law enforcement, data collection, and training programs. The bill also amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow for the forfeiture of proceeds from illegal machinegun trafficking and requires the Attorney General to include information about machinegun conversion devices in the annual firearms trafficking report.
